pkgmetadata.longdescription: Grab Bag of 'ggplot2' Functions // Extra geoms and scales for 'ggplot2', including geom_cloud(), a Normal density cloud replacement for errorbars; transforms ssqrt_trans and pseudolog10_trans, which are loglike but appropriate for negative data; interp_trans() and warp_trans() which provide scale transforms based on interpolation; and an infix compose operator for scale transforms.
